Business Strategy

The Hearth Economic Model: Perpetual Storage, NFTs, and Artist Earnings.

Hearth operates on a "Free to Create, Pay to Preserve" model, evolving the traditional greeting card industry into a permanent digital asset class. We align incentives between users, artists, and the platform through Web3 technology.

1. The "Hearth Stone" (NFT) Model

Unlike traditional e-cards that disappear when a server bill isn't paid, Hearth messages are designed to be permanent. Users can "crystallize" any message into a Hearth Stone â€” an NFT on the Polygon/Arweave network.

2. Artist Marketplace

Hearth is an open platform. 3D artists and musicians can contribute assets to the ecosystem and earn royalties.

  • Themes: Artists upload GLB scenes. When a user mints a message using that theme, the artist gets 30%.
  • Audio: Musicians upload ambient tracks. Smart contracts automate royalty splits.
  • Templates: Curated "best practice" message templates for specific occasions.

3. White Label & Enterprise

Hearth Engine is licensed to high-volume institutional senders.

  • Condolence Books: Funeral homes offering permanent digital memorials.
  • Corporate Gifting: HR platforms automating work anniversaries with high-touch digital assets.
  • Event Invites: Wedding planners creating RSPV-enabled 3D scenes.

4. The "Hallmark 2.0" Vision

We are not selling files; we are selling emotional permanence. Just as a physical letter is treasured for decades, a Hearth message is built to last. By using decentralized storage, we ensure that even if Hearth (the company) disappears, the messages remain.
